subject: Religion & Spirituality
title: Who Was Prophet Muhammad?
description: One-minute skill: Who Was Prophet Muhammad?.

hook.text: A merchant in a cave heard a voice say 'Recite.' That moment in 610 CE launched a faith now followed by two billion.

buildup.text: Muhammad was a trader in Mecca. At 40, he began receiving revelations he believed came from God via angel Gabriel.

discovery.text: His message was radical monotheism: one God, social justice, and equality. Mecca's elite saw him as a threat.

twist.text: Persecuted, Muhammad fled to Medina in 622 CE. This migration â€” the Hijra â€” marks year one of the Islamic calendar.

climax.text: Within a decade, Muhammad united Arabia. Within a century, Islam stretched from Spain to India.

punchline.text: One man in a cave. Two billion followers. Islam's origin story.

quiz.question: What event marks year one of the Islamic calendar?
